Yaks" » Index » GlobalEvents

Class: GlobalEvents

Defined in: src/utils/globalEvents.coffee

Overview

Normalising Global events and passing them To PubSub

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) ready() Window/Document ready
  • # (void) _ready_completed() Remove event and publish load event once fired
  • # (void) resize() Listen to browser resize and pass to pubsub
  • # (void) _resize_handler() Do not fire all the resize events as will slow down plugins
  • # (void) _resize_fire() Publish resize event
  • # (void) _resize_get_breakpoint_name() Get CSS breakpoint name for resize
  • # (void) scroll() Scroll event to pubsub
  • # (void) _scroll_handler() Do not fire all the scroll events as will slow down plugins
  • # (void) _scroll_fire() Publish scroll event

Constructor Details
